name: Frost Giant Jarl
description: The Frost Giant Jarl is a massive creature with impressive physical strength, characterized by its cold demeanor and battleaxe. It is heavily muscled and covered in frost, embodying the essence of winter.
memorable: This giant's ability to grapple foes and its icy gaze make it a daunting opponent, capable of dealing significant damage and controlling the battlefield.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and enforce its will, using sheer strength and tactics.
relations: Often commands lesser frost giants or winter creatures, and may be found in cold mountainous regions.
environment: Typically found in snowy mountains or icy plains.
strengths: Resilient against cold damage, with high hit points and strong melee attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can cause it to become rattled in combat.
attacks: Engages in melee combat with a powerful battleaxe or hurls large rocks from a distance; it can also grapple and stomp its enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Icy Gaze, which can inflict significant cold damage and hinder an opponent's movement.
equipment: Battleaxe, a weapon that delivers devastating slashing damage.
senses: Passive Perception of 14 enables it to notice threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in Athletics and Survival, reflecting its physical prowess and adaptability to its environment.
additional_information: Utilizes a special ability called Fire Fear, which causes it to become rattled when taking fire damage.
Capable of multiattacking to deliver devastating strikes against foes.
Can throw large rocks at range, dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
Can grapple and throw smaller opponents, using them as improvised weapons.
Possesses a reach of 10 feet with its battleaxe attacks.
test_queries: giant with icy gaze and battleaxe
powerful frost giant vulnerable to fire
huge giant that dominates the battlefield
frost giant jarl with grappling abilities
